name: get_individual_bank
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool exchange_rates_live.
Tool description: An API showing all the latest currencies from official banks.
API description: Get rates from Central banks using prefixed. 
Denmark National Bank (dkk), 
National Bank Of Poland (pln),
European Central Bank  (eur),
European Central Bank  - calculated for USD base(usd), 
Swedish Central Bank  (sek)
Feel free to contact me If you wish to add new currency rates/ banks.

bankid.description: The identifier for the desired central bank (e.g., 'dkk' for Denmark National Bank, 'pln' for National Bank Of Poland, 'eur' for European Central Bank, 'usd' for USD base rate by the European Central Bank, 'sek' for Swedish Central Bank).
